actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow Members of State legislatures the same income tax business deduction for living expenses as is allowed members of Congress.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow Members of State legislatures the same income tax business deduction for living expenses as is allowed Members of Congress.

titles.title: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow Members of State legislatures the same income tax business deduction for living expenses as is allowed members of Congress.
